scripts.nuxi-upgrade: pnpm dlx nuxi upgrade ./app/core && pnpm dlx nuxi upgrade ./packages/finance && pnpm dlx nuxi upgrade ./packages/ui && pnpm dlx nuxi upgrade ./packages/server
scripts.all-clean: pnpm dlx nuxi cleanup ./app/core && pnpm dlx nuxi cleanup ./packages/finance && pnpm dlx nuxi cleanup ./packages/ui && pnpm dlx nuxi cleanup ./packages/server
scripts.purge-nuxt: rm -r ./packages/ui/node_modules && rm -r ./packages/ui/.nuxt && rm -r ./packages/server/node_modules && rm -r ./packages/server/.nuxt && rm -r ./packages/finance/node_modules && rm -r ./packages/finance/.nuxt && rm -r ./app/core/node_modules && rm -r ./app/core/.nuxt
scripts.purge-all: rm -r ./node_modules && rm ./pnpm-lock.yaml && rm -r ./packages/ui/node_modules && rm -r ./packages/ui/.nuxt && rm -r ./app/core/node_modules && rm -r ./app/core/.nuxt
